caption.p: Dendrogram of chemical data of essential oils from species affiliated with P. ovalifolia and P. rotundifolia. BNM = P. sp. Barren Mountain, LAA = P. lanceolata, BEM = P. sp. Blue Mountains, CIA = P. cineolifera, ULN = P. sp. Ulan, COA = P. cotinifolia, OVA = P. ovalifolia (actual), and ROA = P. rotundifolia (actual).
